Setengah Populasi Nelayan Indramayu Terlindungi Asuransi
02 Nov 2019, 13:17 by Gelar Gandarasa
INDRAMAYU, (PR).- Program asuransi nelayan dari pemerintah pusat perlahan mulai dilirik oleh kalangan nelayan di Kabupaten Indramayu. Ada sejumlah manfaat yang didapatkan oleh para nelayan jika tergabung ke dalam program tersebut. Pemerintah daerah pun terus berupaya meningkatkan jumlah peserta di Kabupaten Indramayu.
Berdasarkan data dari Dinas Kelautan dan Perikanan Kabupaten Indramayu, saat ini jumlah peserta asuransi telah mencapai 15.717 orang. Jumlah itu hampir mencakup setengah dari jumlah nelayan di Kabupaten Indramayu yang mencapai 37.616 orang.
Kepala Dinas Perikanan dan Kelautan Kabupaten Indramayu, Hakim mengatakan bahwa saat ini nelayan mulai merasakan manfaat dari asuransi tersebut. Asuransi nelayan pertama kali diberlakukan pada tahun 2016 silam. Hingga saat ini jumlah klaim yang sudah dibayarkan mencapai lebih dari Rp 5,364 miliar.
“Pada tahun 2016 jumlah klaim yang telah dibayar mencapai Rp 3,4 miliar,” kata Hakim, Jumat, 1 November 2019. Dia pun berharap, dana tersebut bisa bermanfaat bagi keluarga para nelayan yang mengalami musibah. Hakim menambahkan, pemerintah daerah pun terus berupaya menambah jumlah kepesertaan agar lebih banyak lagi nelayan yang dapat merasakan manfaat dari asuransi tersebut.
Untuk mewujudkannya, sosialisasi dari dinas perikanan dan kelautan terus dilakukan pada para nelayan. Hasilnya setiap tahun peminat asuransi nelayan memang cukup tinggi. Menurutnya nelayan perlu dilindungi mengingat tingkat risiko pekerjaannya yang cukup tinggi.
Tak jarang mereka harus berlayar hingga ke wilayah Papua untuk mencari ikan. “Sejak tahun 2016 asuransi diberlakukan, kepesertaan mencapai 5.180 orang. Kemudian tahun 2017 ada 7.706 orang, tahun 2018 ada 1.199 orang, dan tahun 2019 ini sudah menyentuh 1.632 orang,” ungkap Hakim. Upaya yang telah dilakukan selama ini diharapkan bisa menarik lebih banyak peserta asuransi nelayan.***

Half the Indramayu Fishermen Population is Covered by Insurance
02 Nov 2019, 13:17 by Title of Axle
INDRAMAYU, (PR) .- The fishermen insurance program from the central government is slowly being looked at by fishermen in Indramayu Regency. There are a number of benefits to the fishermen if they are incorporated into the program. The regional government continues to increase the number of participants in Indramayu Regency.
Based on data from the Office of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries of Indramayu Regency, currently the number of insurance participants has reached 15,717 people. That number almost covers half of the number of fishermen in Indramayu Regency which reaches 37,616 people.
The Head of the Indramayu Regency's Fisheries and Maritime Service, Hakim said that now fishermen are starting to feel the benefits of the insurance. Fisherman insurance was first imposed in 2016 ago. Until now the number of claims that have been paid has reached more than Rp5,364 billion.
"In 2016 the number of claims that had been paid reached Rp. 3.4 billion," Hakim said, Friday, November 1, 2019. He also hoped that the funds could be beneficial for the families of fishermen who experienced the disaster. The judge added that the regional government continued to increase the number of participants so that more fishermen could benefit from the insurance.
To make it happen, the socialization of the fisheries and marine services continues to be done to the fishermen. The result is that every year fisherman insurance enthusiasts are indeed quite high. According to him, fishermen need to be protected given the high level of occupational risk.
Quite often they have to sail all the way to Papua to look for fish. "Since 2016 the insurance has been implemented, membership has reached 5,180 people. Then in 2017 there were 7,706 people, in 2018 there were 1,199 people, and in 2019 this had touched 1,632 people, "said the Judge. Efforts that have been made so far are expected to attract more fishermen insurance participants. ***
